about_the_game:
Your engines have already been started!
With a few short clicks you will find yourself in control of a race car, not at the start of the race, but at the final laps. With cunning plans and razor sharp instincts steer yourself to the front, determined to become the last lap hero!

Tactical Turn Based Racing
Find yourself online opponents from all around the globe, and match your plan to beat theirs. Choose your gear carefully, do you play it safe with a lower one or risk spinning out with the biggest gear possible. Do you choose the riskiest line, do you care if paint changes owner-- few of the many tools at your disposal to reach the finish line first.

Safe Online Environment
We strive to bring you a safe way to play, through the help of Steam datagram relay and a curated set of chat commands.

Bring Your Friends (or Don't)
Invite up to four (un)friendly rivals and compete for supremacy in matchmade games.

When All the Lights Turn Red
Wishlist our game and be the first on track!

name: Last Lap Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Take control of the last laps in legendary races, represent famous teams and turn the tides from where it was supposed to go. Fall in love with the Tyrant or wear the Wombat Drivers Club coat with pride. Lock in your gear, push your luck and reach the finish line first, becoming the Last Lap Hero!
